title: Senior Lecturer Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Ngee Ann Polytechnic
Interview Descriptions: Two rounds of interview, 1st round to be conducted at school level with oral presentation and written test. The panel members are school director, assistant director and course chair;  the 2nd round to be conducted at NP level, the panel consisted of principal, HR rep, and school director.
Interview Questions: What kind of project have you lead/participated previously?

title: FSV EAE Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. I interviewed at Ngee Ann Polytechnic
Interview Descriptions: not sure if they changed it now but from what i went through, they asked me why i was interested in films and what movies i like, especially asking if there was any singapore director i looked up to. there was also a group activity where we had to make a storyboard. most important thing they want to see is passion - i didnt rlly have much experience but managed to get in bc i talked all abt what got me into film and what i like abt it

title: Learning Designer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Ngee Ann Polytechnic in Nov 2021
Interview Descriptions:
Easy and smooth interview process. The interviewers were nice and ensure that it was a nice environment to open up to.

Easy going and stressfree interviewer. Not as nerve wrecking as you think.
Interview Questions: What are your strengths and weaknesses.

title: Research Project Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Ngee Ann Polytechnic
Interview Descriptions: interview was a straight forward process.  the job description was very clear and scheduling the interview was very easy without any problems. after the interview, call from hr took sometime
Interview Questions: questions about the expertise and the related experiences

title: Learning and Career Ambassador Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Ngee Ann Polytechnic (Singapore)
Interview Descriptions:
I applied online, and was contacted through email to attend an interview. In the email you’ll be asked to submit a written assessment and declaration forms to the panel. Due to safe distancing measures, interviews were done on Teams slated for half an hour.

Throughout this process there wasn’t a HR person involved so I felt that it could have been better organised. I’ve been to other virtual interviews for similar roles and the felt that Ngee Ann Poly’s professional standards/image could be a little higher.
Interview Questions:
(Assessment) What would you do as a Sales Manager of CET
(Assessment) What do you think are the key attributes of someone being in a helping profession 
(Interview) Tell me about yourself, what do you know about the role

title: Learning Designer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Ngee Ann Polytechnic (Singapore) in Jul 2020
Interview Descriptions: The interview was conducted by Zoom. The interview is quite chill,  but they did ask you why you want to take up this position and whether you know what learning design is. But overall, not too difficult because they are looking for learning designers at the time.
Interview Questions: Tell me what learning design is.

title: Adjunct Lecturer Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Ngee Ann Polytechnic
Interview Descriptions: Amazing yeay really good it was nice to see people talkign to me i really enjoyed everything and evrryone. They were so nice to everyone and even offered us drinks. where else could you get such service

title: School Counsellor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Ngee Ann Polytechnic (Singapore) in Feb 2020
Interview Descriptions:
Write a short essay about topics related to NP, students, the education system in Singapore. You'll be given a list of questions to choose from. 
eg, How do you think the polytechnic landscape will evolve over the next 5 years? 
Can entrepreneurship be taught? 
If you're a team leader how do you help your members understand the need for change?
Interview Questions:
Tell us about your work history? your modalities? 
details about qualification, skills sets and knowledge.

title: Student Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Ngee Ann Polytechnic (Singapore) in Jun 2019
Interview Descriptions: The group interview is very explorative and engaging. The questions that they ask are quite unexpected so be prepared. All in all, it was an interesting interview process and I would return again for another job position.
Interview Questions: What makes you stand out from the rest?

title: Contract Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Ngee Ann Polytechnic
Interview Descriptions:
Received an email notification of my interview. Indicated for me to bring down the necessary documents for their background check.

Normal waiting area and a written test after the verbal interview.

title: Adjunct Lecturer Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Ngee Ann Polytechnic
Interview Descriptions: Informal interiews that involved 3 personnel at any time. There were 2 rounds of interview. There was also a presentation round. The waiting process for the offer can be quite long.

title: Adjunct Lecturer Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at Ngee Ann Polytechnic (Singapore) in Mar 2017
Interview Descriptions: A panel of current head of department will question you regarding your thoughts on students and how you manage them. The main idea is to share with them your take on education and how you can fit into their work culture. So it's best to ask them questions as well to let them know you can align to their space with relevant skill sets.
Interview Questions: How do you manage a class with very fast learners and very slow learners.

title: Visiting Lecturer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Ngee Ann Polytechnic (Singapore) in Jan 2017
Interview Descriptions: There are 2 or more rounds depending on school yo school. The first round is usually an introduction round and for me, writing a short essay was involded. The second round is teaching sample.
Interview Questions: Being a lecturer is not just about teaching. It's a lot of extra work beyond classrooms. Are you OK with that?

title: Lecturer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 months. I interviewed at Ngee Ann Polytechnic (Singapore) in Aug 2014
Interview Descriptions:
2 rounds of interview.
First round was with the Director, Deputy Directors, and Course Managers.
Second round was with the HR, Deputy Principal, and Principal.
1 presentation:
5 minutes to present on a topic that you are applying to teach.
1 written essay:
Topic: Do you think values can be taught to our students? Why or why not?
Interview Questions:
Why do you want to teach?
How is your previous experience useful in the teaching job?

title: Management Support Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Ngee Ann Polytechnic (Singapore) in Apr 2014
Interview Descriptions:
Panel interview with 3 department heads. General questions were asked and it was casual and friendly.
They just want to know about you, what kind of jobs experiences you've had and what to expect for this role.  And they expect me to stay long for this job.
 There was a written questionnaire after the interview which asked my opinion on the demand for polytechnic education. There was a second interview which I didn't turn up for after they contacted me.
Interview Questions: Describe yourself. Tell us about yourself.

title: Lecturer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Ngee Ann Polytechnic (Singapore) in Feb 2013
Interview Descriptions: It was 2-phase process. In the first phase, it is a panel interview with the school (faculty) you applied which requires interviewees to provide a demo teaching and write an essay as other public service. The 2nd phase is another round of panel interview with the principal for formality purpose.
Interview Questions: Why do you wish to teach

title: MSO (CET) Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 months. I interviewed at Ngee Ann Polytechnic (Singapore) in Nov 2012
Interview Descriptions:
1st Interview: Hiring manager and HR manager interviewed. Generally questions to see fit in company.
2nd Interview: Directors of hiring department, 1 HR staff and 1 other person interview. Ask about theoretical questions, situational questions, open to questions and answers.
Interview Questions: What is one difficult situation in your past job that you worked to solve?

title: Student Ambassador Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Ngee Ann Polytechnic (Singapore) in May 2012
Interview Descriptions:
Three Stages
- Group Interview 
[A group scenario to evaluate everyone against each other and to see who stands out]
- Leader's Interview
[Three to one scenario to evaluate job fit/ motivations et al.]
- Officer's Interview
[One to one scenario to evaluate job fit/ motivations et al.]

The results was posted onto the website with approximately 50 names from the 500-700 people who applied for the interview.
Interview Questions: Why do you think you can contribute to this society?

title: Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Ngee Ann Polytechnic (Singapore) in Aug 2010
Interview Descriptions: Written assessment and 1st interview (informal), followed by 2nd interview (formal) with senior management.
Interview Questions: None. Questions are very general for admin department jobs
